# Customizing Theme

**[BaseTheme](/docs/theme/default-heme#basetheme-props)** object is where you define your application's color palette.

If you need to customize the default theme to match your design requirements you should implement **BaseTheme** from `ra-theme-context`

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import CodeBlock from '@theme/CodeBlock';

### Javascript

<Tabs>
<TabItem value="function-component" label="Function Component" default>

```jsx showLineNumbers
// highlight-start
import ThemeContext from '@ra/theme-context';
// highlight-end

const myThemeColors = {
  default: '#4A148C',
  background: "#C5CAE9",
  card: "#E8EAF6",
  text: '#ffffff',
  border: '#9FA8DA',
  info: "#00E5FF",
  success: "#00C853",
  warning: "#F9A825",
  error: "#B71C1C",
  dark: "#212121",
  secondary: "#F50057",
  light: "#ebebeb",
  primary: '#26C6DA'
};

function App() {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: myThemeColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="class-component" label="Class Component">

```jsx showLineNumbers
// highlight-start
import ThemeContext from '@ra/theme-context';
// highlight-end

const myThemeColors = {
  default: '#4A148C',
  background: "#C5CAE9",
  card: "#E8EAF6",
  text: '#ffffff',
  border: '#9FA8DA',
  info: "#00E5FF",
  success: "#00C853",
  warning: "#F9A825",
  error: "#B71C1C",
  dark: "#212121",
  secondary: "#F50057",
  light: "#ebebeb",
  primary: '#26C6DA'
};

class App extends React.Component {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: themeColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

## TypeScript

<Tabs>
<TabItem value="function-component" label="Function Component" default>

```jsx showLineNumbers
// highlight-start
import ThemeContext, { BaseTheme } from '@ra/theme-context';
// highlight-end

const myThemeColors: BaseTheme = {
  default: '#4A148C',
  background: "#C5CAE9",
  card: "#E8EAF6",
  text: '#ffffff',
  border: '#9FA8DA',
  info: "#00E5FF",
  success: "#00C853",
  warning: "#F9A825",
  error: "#B71C1C",
  dark: "#212121",
  secondary: "#F50057",
  light: "#ebebeb",
  primary: '#26C6DA'
};

function App() {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: myThemeColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="class-component" label="Class Component">

```jsx showLineNumbers
// highlight-start
import ThemeContext, { BaseTheme } from '@ra/theme-context';
// highlight-end

const myThemeColors: BaseTheme = {
  default: '#4A148C',
  background: "#C5CAE9",
  card: "#E8EAF6",
  text: '#ffffff',
  border: '#9FA8DA',
  info: "#00E5FF",
  success: "#00C853",
  warning: "#F9A825",
  error: "#B71C1C",
  dark: "#212121",
  secondary: "#F50057",
  light: "#ebebeb",
  primary: '#26C6DA'
};

class App extends React.Component<{}, {}> {
  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{colors: themeColors}}>
      <YourAPP />
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  );
}
```
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
